pr_title: Always send and update innerHTML property value

timeline.message:
Run collect changes logic for features whose changes are not responded

- In inactive state changes for features which are "not important" are
not sent to the client side.
- But internal logic which updates the feature is still invoked which
makes change tracker collect undesired changes in case of update.
- On the other hand the collection logic for such features doesn't do
anything which kind of break the contract.
- To be able to avoid broken contract the changes should be collected
for all features
- For "important" features the collector should be applied as is.
- For other feature the collector should be no-op.
